message: I have a great product that I think you'll love, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This is a one-time offer, so don't wait!
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to spend closer to $100. Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
